amendment.description: To allow North Koreans to apply for refugee status or asylum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1138 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1138 proposed by Senator Brownback to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9093-9094; text: CR S9093) To allow North Koreans to apply for refugee status or asylum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1138 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1138 proposed by Senator Brownback to Amendment SA 1136.
